item.title: Is Hollow Knight: Silksong too hard? Well, it depends on what you mean by “hard.”
item.description: The Ars Difficulty Matrix™ helps us analyze the many dimensions of Silksong’s challenges.

item.title: Explaining the Internet’s obsession with Silksong, which (finally) comes out Sept. 4
item.description: Hollow Knight fans found strange ways to cope with impatience and anticipation.
